softwareEngineer.title: Software Engineer
softwareEngineer.description: Front-end Developer Computer enthusiast since childhood. I have various experience in the tech field, such as photo editing and sound design. I currently work as a Software Engineer at TUI Musement with Nuxt and Vue Frameworks

runner.title: Runner
runner.description: Runner since I was a child, specialized in sprint and middle distance, today I run for the A.S.D. Team Atletica Palermo, my distances are 1500m and 800m on track but I also ran the half-marathon in 1h30m.
